text: Sabahoon Qaume (born 11 February 1992) is an Afghan international footballer who plays for Danish club Kolding IF, as a right back. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Afghan footballers Category:Afghanistan international footballers Category:Kolding IF players Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Afghan expatriate footballers Category:Afghan expatriate sportspeople in Denmark Category:Expatriate footballers in Denmark Category:Sportspeople from Khost
title: Sabahoon Qaume
